dct_description_sm: Topographical map indicating Naauwpoort and other towns and villages, roads, railways, rivers, mountains and other features in the area surrounding Naauwpoort.
Relief shown by contours, form lines and spot heights.
Map folds into an outer cover.
2 ancillary maps (scale 1 in. to 0.5 miles): Hanover -- New Bethesda ; 2 ancillary maps (scale 1 in. to 1 mile): Middelburg -- Naauwpoort.
Descriptive text on nature of country, roads, transport, water, fuel and grazing.
dct_publisher_sm: Drawn and printed at the War Office
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
